channel.title: Zip-A-Dee-Doo-Pod: An Unofficial Disney Podcast
channel.description: From the author of The Thinking Fan's Guide to Walt Disney World: Magic Kingdom comes a podcast for any passionate and enthusiastic Disney fan! Reviews, news, analysis, countdowns, rankings, and more.
channel.itunes:author: Aaron Wallace
channel.itunes:summary: A thinking man's podcast for the Disney fan. Reviews, news, analysis, countdowns, and rankings. From movies and music to Broadway and the theme parks coast to coast and around the world -- Zip-A-Dee-Doo-Pod is dedicated to all things Disney.

item.title: ZADDP #71: What's It Like to Live in Disney World?
item.description:
What's it like to live in Walt Disney World? How does moving to Orlando change your theme park perspective as a diehard Disney fan? Is the tradeoff worth it? Fresh off of his two-year "Orlandoversary," Aaron looks at 15 ways that Florida residence has changed his WDW experience.

• As heard in the show: Aaron's book, The Thinking Fan's Guide to Walt Disney World: Magic Kingdom, is now available on paperback and as an eBook!

• Aaron's Frozen movie review

• Aaron's Saving Mr. Banks movie review

• "Who's Your Inner Muppet?" — Aaron's Sam the Eagle guest entry at This Happy Place Blog

• The Top 30 Songs of 2013

• Avatarland: A Limerick 

• It's A Small World: 50th Anniversary #smallworld50 reflections

• The Three CommentEars - Unofficial Mary Poppins Audio Commentary with Special Guest Aaron Wallace

• The Something Clever Show by Kyle Burbank and Emily Nadolski (featuring a brilliant Carousel of Progress 2013 reenactment)

• The 26 Best Christmas Albums of All Time

• Aaron's 2014 Oscar Picks & Predictions

Total runtime - 49 minutes

Thanks for listening! Be sure to leave a quick review on iTunes!

Find more about the show at the official website: http://www.aaronwallaceonline.com

Be sure to listen to Aaron on another fun, unofficial Disney show, The Hub Podcast: http://thehubpodcast.com (Episode #66 includes a Muppets Most Wanted movie review + much more!)

Check out The Disneyland Gazette too!

Send comments, questions, and feedback to podcast@aaronwallaceonline.com — or you can record yourself on an audio file and email that in too! A new mailbag show is coming soon!

Follow Aaron and the show on Twitter! http://www.twitter.com/aaronspod

Please "like" the show's Facebook page! http://www.facebook.com/zipadeedoopod

Follow Aaron on Instagram too! (New!) http://www.instagram.com/awallnotawol

Zip-A-Dee-Doo-Pod is an official member of The Disney Podcast Network. http://www.thedpn.com

item.title: ZADDP #70: Ep(i)c(fail)ot
item.description:
Kyle Burbank (of The Disneyland Gazette) return for Part 2 of his Walt Disney World New Year’s Eve trip report with Aaron. Discussion includes:

  • Aaron’s review of Star Wars Weekends 2013 & Hyperspace Hoopla
  • Darth Vader chocolate & peanut butter cupcake at Darth Mall
  • Epcot’s New Year’s Eve fail
  • Test Track 2.0 and the world’s longest wait
  • Magic Kingdom’s multiple New Year’s Eves
  • DAK after “dak”
  • The best Club Cool combo at Epcot
  • Wreck-It Ralph at DisneyQuest
  • Dry Ice “explosion” at Disneyland
  • Gun found on Dinosaur at Disney’s Animal Kingdom
  • a Finding Nemo: The Musical debate
  • Disney’s Art of Animation Resort review
  • Walt Disney World at Christmas review
  • Celebrate the Magic vs. Let the Memories Begin
  • Disneyland holiday overlays vs. Walt Disney World’s lack thereof
  • “Swishes”
  • “Disney on the Web”
  • …and much, much more!

• As heard in the show: Aaron’s book, The Thinking Fan’s Guide to Walt Disney World: Magic Kingdom, is now available on paperback and as an eBook!

Total runtime – 1 hour, 21 minutes

Thanks for listening! Be sure to leave a quick review on iTunes!

item.title: ZADDP #68: Is Universal's Harry Potter Leaving Disney in the Dust?
item.description:
Universal Orlando just announced a major expansion to its Wizarding World of Harry Potter — Diagon Alley! Find out why Disney fans lashed out at Walt Disney World AND at Aaron this week after the news broke. Is Universal wiping the floor with Disney thanks to Harry Potter?

PLUS: What are the best ways to celebrate Mother's Day the Disney Way?

AND: Aaron's brief report from Merida's official coronation ceremony  in Magic Kingdom!

• As heard in the show: Aaron's book, The Thinking Fan's Guide to Walt Disney World: Magic Kingdom, is now available on paperback and as an eBook!

• Join Aaron for a book signing at Books-A-Million in Gastonia, NC at 1 p.m. (Eastern) on 5/19/13!

• Join Aaron and Matt theEsquire (from Mouse Droppings and The Hub) for a live podcast performance in Magic Kingdom on 24-Hour Day from 5/24-25/13!

Total runtime - 46 minutes

Thanks for listening! Be sure to leave a quick review on iTunes!

item.title: ZADDP #67: Disney Music Hall of Fame - Ceremony #1 (Part 2)
item.description:
Zip-A-Dee-Doo-Pod continues its brand-new Disney Music Hall of Fame with this, Part 2 of the Inaugural Induction Ceremony!

This time around, FOUR new songs are inducted: one from the 1970s, one from the 1980s, one from the 1990s, and one from 2000-Present. (Songs from the 60s, 50s, and pre-50s were inducted in Part 1).

Each new inductee is treated to a detailed history and an in-depth, revelatory analysis.

PLUS: Get new updates on Aaron’s book, The Thinking Fan’s Guide to Walt Disney World: Magic Kingdom, which is now available on paperback and as an eBook!

• As heard in the show [WARNING: SPOILER!] – Music Video by The Jets

• As heard in the show [WARNING: SPOILER!] – A "Harmonic Analysis" of the 1980s selection

• As heard in the show – "That's What Love is For"

Total runtime – 47 minutes

item.title: ZADDP #65: Harry Potter and the Unfortunate Car-eoke (WDW Trip Report, Part 3)
item.description:
The third and final installment in Aaron's epic trip report from his month-long vacation celebration in August 2010. ***Headphones recommended for binaural recordings!*** Featuring:

• Saratoga Springs resort: a chance encounter and a lunch review

• The scariest ride in Walt Disney World (not what you think!)

• Universal Studios Orlando: an overview, history, trip report, and review

• First time entering The Wizarding World of Harry Potter

• Aerosmith, Maroon 5, Kris Allen, and Mary Poppins on stage

• A "What Will You Celebrate?" Meal at Tony's Town Square Restaurant

• Aaron's first solo foray into a Disney park

• Sid Cahuenga's Disney Movie / Parks Trivia from Hollywood Studios

• Disneyland book review: Lots to Do in Line

• ZADDP's first (and likely last) "Car-eoke" segment... Aaron sings Disney songs in his car. Lots of them. (Apologies in advance).

• Much more!

Total runtime - 1 hour, 41 minutes

Thanks for listening! Be sure to leave a quick review on iTunes!

Find more about the show at the official website: http://www.aaronwallaceonline.com

item.title: ZADDP #60: Redesigning DCA & More in the Mailbag!
item.description:
The ZADDP mailbag is overflowing with fascinating questions about all things Disney! Aaron answers them all, and ends up completely redesigning California Adventure along the way (Imagineering, you're welcome).

Some topics of discussion include:

      • Hollywood Studios gets over the Love Bug

      • Does Carsland put DCA on the right track?

      • Disney says "Avada Kedavra" to Winnie the Pooh

      • All the idols burn and the fires plume in the Tiki, Tiki, Tiki, Tiki, Tiki Room

      • ZADDP'S Top 100 Disney Songs: How dare you leave out [my favorite song]!?!?

      • Ummm... 
Pete's Dragon
      ?

      • Give a Day, Get a Disney Day -- what's so bad about doing good?

      • How to Make a Podcast: ZADDP's (Not So Secret) Secrets Revealed!

      • Some Soaking Awesome Feedback

      • Potentially promising news about the future of 
Song of the South
      • A tribute to Wally Boag and Betty Taylor
    • Much, much more!

item.title: ZADDP #59: 2010 - A Fairy Tale Ending
item.description:
Join ZADDP in a look back at every Disney movie released during 2010... reviews, what should have won Oscars, and the emerging Disney trends related to these films. Aaron ranks each movie, counting down to #1.

Some topics of discussion include:

• The future of musicals and fairy tales at Walt Disney Feature Animation
• A look at how the Disney Fairies and DisneyNature brands are performing
• The future of the Jonas Brothers' careers
• A different perspective on Tim Burton's Alice in Wonderland
• Disney's all-time box office #Wins and #Fails in 2010
• Is The Disney Channel racist -- or just their Canadian friends? Let's ask Harriet the Spy
• And much, much more!

Movies Featured

      • Tangled

      • Toy Story 3

      • TRON: Legacy

      • Secretariat

      • Alice in Wonderland

      • Camp Rock 2: The Final Jam

      • Oceans

      • The Crimson Wing: Mystery of the Flamingos

      • Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time

      • The Sorcerer's Apprentice

      • Tinker Bell and the Great Fairy Rescue

      • StarStruck

      • Day & Night

      • 16 Wishes

      • Prep & Landing: Operation Secret Santa

      • Harriet the Spy: Blog Wars

      • High School Musical: O Desafio

      • Waking Sleeping Beauty

    • And more!

(This episode is mostly spoiler free. A warning is given before the one slight spoiler toward the end of the episode).

Note: This episode mentions that Toy Story 3 is Disney's highest grossing film of all time. What should have been said is that TS3 is Disney's highest grossing animated film. Including live-action, TS3 is Disney's second highest earner, just behind the second Pirates film.

 

Total runtime - 1 Hour, 30 minutes

 

Thanks for listening! Be sure to leave a quick review on iTunes!

item.title: ZADDP #58: A "Live" WDW Trip Report, Part 2
item.description:
Aaron continues the trip report from his WDW Spring Break vacation with his friend Courtney, but this time, things are a little different. Having realized just how chronologically inaccurate the first episode was, Aaron pulls the reigns in from Courtney and guides you through this part of the trip from inside the studio. There are lots of anecdotes and in-park audio along the way, however, including:

 

• A tourist's complaint at Hollywood Studios Guest Relations

• Ride-throughs on Splash Mountain and Big Thunder Mountain Railroad

• An over-eager tourist who's a little too happy to be meeting someone from England

• Audio of Aaron's first-ever ride on Tower of Terror (who screams more embarrassingly? Aaron, or the row of teen girls beside him?)

• Churro feedback for the Disney Dining folks

• And much, much more!


Once again, your host is new to the world of field recording, so the audio quality isn't always the best. Thank you for your patience! We'll get better with time! 

Headphones are HIGHLY recommended!

**This episode is rated PG for brief incidents of mild language**

 

Total runtime - 1 Hour, 25 minutes

 

Thanks for listening! Be sure to leave a quick review on iTunes!

Find more about the show at the official website, which has a brand-new design!: http://www.aaronwallaceonline.com

Also, be sure to listen to Aaron on another new unofficial Disney podcast, "The Hub": http://thehubpodcast.com

A new ZADDP Mailbag Show is on the way! Send in comments, questions, and feedback now: podcast@aaronwallaceonline.com -- or call the show's phone line and leave a voicemail! NEW PHONE NUMBER: (224) 366-7631 .... that's (224) 366-DOO-POD1

Follow Aaron and the show on Twitter! http://www.twitter.com/aaronspod

Support the show by making a PayPal donation at http://www.aaronwallaceonline.com

A special nod to Kevin MacLeod for creating one of the background audio pieces: ("Olde Timey") Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)

Closing musical selection: "Believe" by Amy Grant

item.title: ZADDP #56: Something Wicked This Way Comes
item.description:
Happy Halloween!

In this episode, Aaron returns to 2009's expanded and updated ZADDP Disney Villains Audio Montage. The montage has now been enhanced with a villains image gallery that plays alongside the audio piece! Basically, this is the long-awaited "cheat sheet" that was promised last Halloween and never came around until now!

Then, Aaron reviews a new Disney book: The Hassle-Free Walt Disney World Vacation 2011 by Steven M. Barrett. Find out how this book really sets itself apart from the others in ways that Disney fans will want to know about.

Finally, Aaron recommends a great and somewhat bizarre Disney Halloween movie that you probably haven't seen!

SPECIAL NOTE: This episode is an enhanced .m4a podcast and requires either iTunes, Quicktime, iPod, iPhone, or iPad for playback. For those who can't use any of the recommended programs or devices, a standard .mp3 version will be available at http://www.aaronwallaceonline.com/zaddp56.html (the .mp3 version will not include the image gallery that runs throughout the enhanced version of the episode).

 

Total runtime - 46 minutes

item.title: ZADDP #48: Disney Legends - Roy E. Disney Tribute Show
item.description:
Zip-A-Dee-Doo-Pod launches its Disney Legends profile series with a tribute to the late Roy E. Disney. With a chronological look at his 80 years of milestones, ZADDP puts the life and career of this legendary filmmaker, executive, and figurehead into context. Along the way, we'll pause to take a closer look at some of his lesser-known Disney movies, Cheetah and Morning Light among them. Listen and find out just why Walt's nephew was such an important man. Also discussed: The final tally for Helping Haiti Heal and an exciting new month-long countdown coming to Zip-A-Dee-Doo-Pod.

Total runtime - 1 hour, 3 minutes

item.title: ZADDP #47: News Roundup - Lose Yourself (In the Magic)
item.description:
Your host takes a look at recent Disney news from around the world and applies some analysis to some of the bigger headlines (20 of them, in fact). Topics include:

From Walt Disney World
• The Give a Day, Get a Disney Day promotion -- its value for Disney, guests, and passholders
• WDW's new Fantasyland project
• Epcot's just-announced Italy pizzeria
• Star Tours II in 3D
• Aerosmith's shake-up and the potential of an impact on Rock 'n' Rollercoaster

From Disneyland
• Disney's World of Color (including a chance to win Amy Grant's book and Greatest Hits CD... plus an explanation of why that's especially relevant to this attraction)
• Captain EO returns
• A new decorative decision on Main Street is leaving some Disneyland guests perturbed

From Walt Disney Productions & Broadway
• Up's chances in the Oscar race
• Tons of sequels on the horizons... and one most unusual remake!
• This spring's jam-packed slate of DVD & Blu-ray releases
• Whoopi Goldberg headlines The Lion King on Broadway

From Walt Disney & Hollywood Records
• A JoBro goes Jolo with a new band

From Burbank, CA
• New Disney Legends inductees

After all of that, get ready to hear Aaron rap (no, really) in the first-ever Zip-A-Dee-Doo-Pod song parody.

Plus: An update on the Helping Haiti Heal initiative 

Total runtime - 1 hour, 25 minutes

Thanks for listening! Be sure to leave a quick review on iTunes!

Find more about the show at the official website: http://www.aaronwallaceonline.com

The 50th episode is just around the corner! Send in your emails! podcast@aaronwallaceonline.com Also, call the show's phone line and leave a voicemail! (919) 809-7777

item.title: ZADDP #41: A Look at 'Walt: The Man Behind the Myth' & More
item.description: Zip-A-Dee-Doo-Pod reviews a 2001 documentary entitled Walt: The Man Behind the Myth. That excellent DVD happens to be on sale for $8.99 at Amazon.com right now, so the show is offering high praise in recommending an immediate purchase! Reflection on the documentary leads to a discussion of the potential for a Walt Disney biopic, as well as the the prestigious Disney Legends Hall of Fame and speculation over the 2009 inductees, and some big announcements from Aaron! Before anyone sends in an email -- in discussing the transition from Roy Disney to Ron Miller, the show neglects to mention the tenures of Disney CEOs Donn Tatum and Card Walker. The omission was inadvertent, as discussion is focused on the Disney family, but it has been noted! item.description: Zip-A-Dee-Doo-Pod Episode #39: Mailbag Show (Villains and Gangsters and JoBros - Oh My!) Aaron answers listener email and announces your chance to win the soundtrack to Disney/Pixar's Up! Topics discussed include: * What makes a good Disney villain? item.title: ZADDP #37: Hannah Hangs Up
item.description: The latest Miley Cyrus scandal has Zip-A-Dee-Doo-Pod doing something its host never thought it would: talking about Ms. Montana herself for a whole episode. But is it really Miley who's behind this controversy, or Disney's PR folks? Listen in to find out why Miley Cyrus keeps hanging up on DJs during live radio telephone interviews -- and to hear the audio of it actually happening! Aaron weighs in on Disney's handling of the situation and shares his own experience in interviewing Disney celebrities and working with the PR reps who come with them. If you're a Fan-na Montana, you'll like half of this episode -- if you can't stand her, you'll like the other half. Either way, you'll want to celebrate the four year anniversary of Zip-A-Dee-Doo-Pod, coming up this week! Total Runtime: 45:06 Thanks for listening! Be sure to leave a quick review on iTunes! item.title: ZADDP #36: 25 Minute Father's Day Special (The Disney Dads)
item.description: In celebration of Father's Day, Zip-A-Dee-Doo-Pod revisits its 2006 "Top 10 Disney Dads" episode. That show, episode #13, contained an audio montage of the "Honorable Mentions" -- Disney Dads who didn't quite make the cut. Three years later, that montage is updated to include: • All the original "honorable mention" dads • The original Top 10 dads (not included in the original montage, as they had their own audio segments throughout the countdown) • New Disney Dads who have joined the Disney family in movies and theme park attractions since the summer of 2006 • A few bonus Disney Dads from classic Disney films who weren't included the first time around The original audio montage was very well received by listeners when it was first released and emails still come in about it to this day. The updated and expanded version is this quick episode is the perfect way to commemorate Father's Day this weekend! Thanks for listening! Be sure to leave a quick review on iTunes! item.title: ZADDP #2: Disney Purchases Pixar (Plus: Changes to the Show)
item.description: In the second episode, "Zip-A-Dee-Doo-Pod" resumes following a 7 month hiatus. Discussion includes changes to the show and Disney's purchase of Pixar. Thanks go to Jesse and Blake! Email at aaronspod@gmail.com (13:40) (12.6 MBs)

item.title: Zip-A-Dee-Doo-Pod Episode #1 (Warning! Audio quality is not so great in the early episodes!)
item.description: The very first show! An introduction, podcasting news, new and upcoming Disney DVDs, and the passing of two Disney legends. There's music and more than a few "um"s, but everything has a first. Enjoy! (Update) Warning: If you're used to the more recent episodes, brace yourself! A cheap microphone, nerves, and an utter lack of experience combine to make this first episode quite the rough production! (18:21) (16.8 MBs)
